about_the_game:
EOPRISM is an educational puzzle shooter set on a chaotic Earth. The countdown is on, as a crash landed 4ner insistent on infinite irrationality and multiplying calculators ready to follow his algorithm attempt to cause mathematical imbalance and overpower Earth. As a pair of roamin' numerals, or counting blocks to be exact, use the power of Math to stop these radical plans and return symmetry between Math and Earth. Earth needs someone to count on!

Embark on a thrilling equation-packed journey! Battle Ianfinite’s forces, solve puzzles, and restore balance in this radical adventure. The stakes are high, and Earth is counting on you to be the hero!

Sharpen your math skills and test your aim! Perfect your formulas and get your calculations ready for the real fight. No pressure, just pure number-crunching fun!

Team up or take on the ultimate math gauntlet solo! Face escalating waves of calculator creatures and tricky puzzles. Prove you’re in your prime with a friend, because two heads are better than one when crunch time hits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Join the fight in EOPRISM, a math shooter where you battle foes to stop Ianfinite’s Order of Operations! After the Day of Tessellation, this alien seeks control with the EOPRISM crystal. Solve puzzles, face calculator creatures, and restore balance before Ianfinite’s chaotic plans become limitless!
